occurrenceCount.title: Occurrence Count
occurrenceCount.description: The number of occurrences of a recurring reminder.  Cannot be used with recurrenceEndDate

adjustStartDate.title: Indicates whether to adjust the start date to the current date when installed

adjustAlertDate.title: Indicates whether to adjust the alert date relative to the alert date when installed

daysOfTheWeek.title: Array of days of the week
daysOfTheWeek.description: Array of days of the week for a recurring reminder. Sunday is 1.

items.title: Day of the Tweek
items.description: Day of the week as a string. Sunday is "1". ("1", "2", ... "7")

daysOfTheMonth.title: Array of days of the month for a recurring reminder

items.title: Day of the Month
items.description: Day of the month as a string ("1", "2", ... "31")

daysOfTheYear.title: Array of days of the year for a recurring reminder

items.title: Day of the Year
items.description: Day of the year as a string ("1", "2", ... "366")

interval.title: Inteval for Recurring Reminder
interval.description: The recurrence interval for a recurring reminder as a string. For example, for weekly, interval of 2 = 'Every 2 weeks'

recurrenceEndDate.title: Recurrence End Date
recurrenceEndDate.description: The recurrence end date for a recurring reminder.  Cannot be used with occurrenceCount

weeksOfTheYear.title: Weeks of the Year
weeksOfTheYear.description: Array of weeks of the year for a recurring reminder

items.title: Week of the Year
items.description: Weeks of the year as a string ("1", "2", ... "52")

monthsOfTheYear.title: Months of the Year
monthsOfTheYear.description: Array of months of the year for a recurring reminder

items.title: Month of the Year
items.description: Months of the year as a string ("1", "2", ... "12")

setPositions.title: Set Positions
setPositions.descriptions: An array of ordinal numbers that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency.

items.title: Set Positions
items.descriptions: Ordinal number that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency

timeZone.title: Time Zone
timeZone.description: The time zone code for dates

isCompleted.title: Is Completed
isCompleted.description: Indicator of whether the reminder is marked complete
